cyclone::ParticleCable

cyclone::ParticleCable Class Reference

Cables link a pair of particles, generating a contact if they stray too far apart. More...

#include <plinks.h>

Public Member Functions

virtual unsigned addContact (ParticleContact *contact, unsigned limit) const

Public Attributes

 Holds the maximum length of the cable.
real restitution

Detailed Description

Cables link a pair of particles, generating a contact if they stray too far apart.
